    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - zstd 1.5.0 h582d3a0_0
  run:
    - libcxx ==11.*
    - libcxx >=11.1.0
    - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
    - python_abi 3.8.* *_cp38
    - rubin-env-nosysroot >=0.7.0,<0.7.1.0a0
test:
  requires:
    - clang_osx-64 11.*
    - clangxx_osx-64 11.*
    - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
    - rubin-env-nosysroot
  script: run_test_impl.sh
about:
  home: https://github.com/beckermr/stackvana-core
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - COPYRIGHT
    - LICENSE
  summary: core build tooling for stackvana
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - beckermr
